name: Savannah Helicopter Training (Pty) Ltd
about: Savannah Helicopter Training (Pty) Ltd is a premier flight school dedicated to providing comprehensive and specialized helicopter training programs. With a focus on safety, excellence, and personalized instruction, we cater to both aspiring professional pilots and enthusiasts. Our state-of-the-art facilities and experienced instructors ensure that students receive the highest quality training, from initial certifications to advanced ratings. We offer a range of courses, including private pilot licenses, commercial pilot licenses, and type ratings, all tailored to meet the unique needs of our students. Our partnership with leading aviation industry partners ensures access to the latest technology and best practices. At Savannah Helicopter Training, we are committed to helping you achieve your aviation goals with professionalism and dedication. Join us to embark on a successful and fulfilling aviation career.
